long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Medlr boosts online shopping for health products by providing real-time price tracking and comparison on e-commerce sites. Key features:

Price Chart Display: Displays dynamic price trends and comparisons on product pages.
Automatic Activation: Automatically detects and activates on relevant sites to deliver pricing data without manual input.
User Session Management: Uses Google OAuth for secure session management across devices.
Data Efficiency and Security: Utilizes the tabs permission for efficient content loading and robust security protocols to protect user data.
Privacy and User Control: Ensures full user control and transparency, adhering to strict data protection standards.
Medlr simplifies decision-making in shopping with efficient, secure tools designed to enhance user experience and protect privacy.

This version keeps the essential information about Medlr’s functionality and privacy focus, suitable for a concise presentation in the Chrome Web Store.
